level.heading: Information clearinghouse.
level.text: The Mayor shall maintain a central clearinghouse for information regarding the implementation of this subchapter and recycling in general. The clearinghouse shall provide data regarding solid waste research and planning, solid waste management policies, markets for recyclable materials, and regional cooperation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-226, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-1001.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-226, the "D.C. Solid Waste Management & Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988", see Mayor's Order 89-160, July 20, 1989.
